<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs=""
>
[Memory Guitar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1739)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Celebrating Hispanic Heritage Month](/Sources.aspx?ID=149) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This simple guitar appears worn and battered from use, but upon close observation, the damage seems to be intentional. From the correct angle, the guitar's scratches and marks seem to form a simple picture, such as an environmental scene or a crude face.
